author: Belinda Ang Saw Ean J (delivering the judgment of the court):
casename: Law Society of Singapore v Sivakolunthu Thirunavukarasu
coram: Belinda Ang Saw Ean J; Andrew Phang Boon Leong JA; Judith Prakash J
counsel: Zaheer K Merchant (Madhavan Partnership) for the applicants; Respondent in person, absent
tags-parsed: Legal Profession/Show cause action/Advocate and solicitor using forgery and fraud to mortgage clients' property for own benefit and misapplying clients' monies/Whether advocate and solicitor's conduct amounting to fraudulent or grossly improper conduct/Appropriate order to be made/Sections 83(2)(b), 83(2)(h) Legal Profession Act (Cap 161, 2001 Rev Ed)
